title: Patriotism In A Cup
description:
A major new competitor in a crowded coffee market makes its debut: Callahan Coffee (00:01:00). Augusta National Golf Club sells out by allowing YouTube Influencers to play dumb games on the course (00:21:47). Mike attempts to defend Chris and his expansion team dreams (00:28:00). A very strange move by Mel Gibson's publicist interrupting his interview with Jesse Waters on Fox News after a question about the Will Smith slapping incident. Budget month lives on, calls & more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
